item.title: Jury says Johnson & Johnson owes $40M to 2 cancer patients who used talcum powders
item.description: A Los Angeles jury has awarded $40 million to two women who claim Johnson & Johnson's talcum powder caused their ovarian cancer

item.title: Why misunderstood wolf from a supermarket ad is moving viewers worldwide
item.description: The two-and-a-half-minute film, "Unloved," tells a simple yet powerful story

item.title: TSA renews push to end collective bargaining agreement for airport security screeners
item.description: The Transportation Security Administration is renewing efforts to end a collective bargaining agreement with airport screening officers
